label: 学士
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Principal member of the Crown Prince's Office.  Drawn from the Ōe, the scholarly branches of the Fujiwara, and similar learned houses, they acted as tutors (p. 823). [大江、藤原、春宮坊]
